output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the required criteria:
1. Has CMF: No CMF number is present in this post.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, it directly refers to Nicolae-Ionel Ciucă, who is a presidential candidate (Position 4).
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement with significant reach (15,000-19,999 impressions) and targeting a large estimated audience (100,001-500,000).
4. Electoral objective: Yes, the post appears to have an electoral objective by attempting to diminish Ciucă's credibility by pointing out his previous electoral defeat in his hometown. The message "nici vecinii nu-l mai votează" (even neighbors don't vote for him anymore) is clearly intended to influence voters' perception.
5. Journalism: No, this doesn't follow journalistic standards. It's a political attack without providing context, sources, or balanced reporting.
6. Personal opinion: No, this is a paid advertisement from PSD Dolj, making it an organized political communication rather than a personal opinion.
The post is clearly negative propaganda targeting a presidential candidate after the campaign period has ended, which is a violation of Article 55 t).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It directly targets a presidential candidate - Has clear negative electoral messaging - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Attempts to influence voters by highlighting past electoral failures - Comes from a competing political party (PSD) targeting another candidate (PNL)
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin publicarea și promovarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook cu ID 1086980712697748 care constituie propaganda electorală negativă la adresa candidatului prezidențial Nicolae-Ionel Ciucă după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea, care afirmă "Cum să pierzi la tine acasă? Ciucă a fost învins chiar în localitatea natală la alegerile locale. Se pare că nici vecinii nu-l mai votează!", are un evident scop electoral negativ, încercând să influențeze opinia alegătorilor prin sublinierea unui eșec electoral anterior al candidatului. Acțiunea a fost realizată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, într-un moment în care propaganda electorală este interzisă prin lege, atingând un public între 15.000 și 19.999 de persoane prin intermediul unei reclame plătite.
